ValidationRule.description: Requires that the status be changed to "rescheduled" if the start date/time or the estimated duration is changed on a meeting that is currently scheduled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'BOFE_Hearing' && !ISCHANGED ( Status__c ) && ISPICKVAL ( Status__c, 'Scheduled' ) && ( ISCHANGED ( Meeting_Start_Date_Time__c ) || ISCHANGED ( Estimated_Duration__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must change the status to "rescheduled" in order to change the start time or estimated duration of the meeting.
